description.en: The main topics in the course include: presentation on the methods for the study and research of the cybersecurity topics. The course will include guidelines on how to approach and structure scientific results, how to analyse results and present them to the audience.
description.et: Kursuse peamised teemad on: küberkaitse teemade uurimise ja uurimise meetodite tutvustamine. Kursus sisaldab juhiseid, kuidas läheneda ja struktureerida teadustulemusi, kuidas tulemusi analüüsida ja neid esitada.

objectives.en: This seminar will cover advanced topics in the field of cybersecurity, both from a technology and from an engineering perspective. Students will engage in active learning by reading academic and industry papers on various topics in the field, presenting these papers to the class, and participating in focused discussions.
objectives.et: Seminar käsitleb küberkaitse teemasid nii tehnoloogia kui ka inseneri seisukohalt. Üliõpilased tegelevad aktiivõppega, lugedes valdkonna erinevatel teemadel akadeemilisi ja tööstusartikleid, esitades neid teistele ja osaledes fokusseeritud aruteludes.

learning_outcomes.en: On successful completion of this course, students should be able to:
learning_outcomes.et: Selle kursuse edukal läbimisel peaksid õpilased suutma:

learning_outcomes.en: 1.	Collect, analyze and present information about advanced topics in the field of cybersecurity in a structured manner
learning_outcomes.et: 1. Koguda, analüüsida ja esitada struktureeritud viisil teavet küberkaitse valdkonna teemade kohta

learning_outcomes.en: 2.	Formulate informed observations and comments about key issues and approaches in the field of cybersecurity
learning_outcomes.et: 2. Koostada ja esitada kommentaare küberkaitse põhiküsimuste ja lähenemisviiside kohta

independent_work.et: Find the research topic and supervisor, write the 2 page problem statement, research the field (depending on the topic), review at least 5-7 scientific papers and perform a literature review, organise bibliography, write a report and submit it on time, prepare for and present the researched topic in class.
